title: Kai'Sa, and Leona. Possible Overpowered Combo?
body: I was reading through the generic troll/lol posts about how 'kaisa does dmg omg op", and i thought,  since her passive applies on ALL hard CC, Leona's a perfect fit for her. Her E is a root, Q stun, then Ulti which applies her passive to 1-3 people.

replies.body: Note to self: get friend to play Leona on Kai'Sa's release
Note to self: buy leo, and find a Kai'sa player in 2 weeks

I remember when braum was released and i immidetly thought about lucian (back when he had 550 range and wasnt trash).
The first days of playing lucian with braum support were so fun, pretty much guranteed stun + burst.
If you want ridiculous burst in lane with Kai'Sa, choose {{champion:432}}
Yes! i love playing bard+electrocute support, the adc gets sooo cocky.. then you delete half his health bar with 1 Q+Auto+meep+Cheap-Shot+Electrocute.

She's going to need teammates that combo with her like Yasuo + knockup champions to be great though.

As a Leona main, watching the abilities spotlight, this struck me immediately.

Then we got to her R and I realised I'm going to be reported by my team AND the enemy team for trolling if I don't sup her with Thresh.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

Technically Rakan's better on the CC though. He can get his R onto 5 people quite easily. It'd also be hilarious if it proc'd off of Bard's ult.
Well, maybe. But I have nightmares of Leona + Miss Fortune

Recently did this combo. This is absolutely oppressive in a lane where Leona is allowed to bully the crap out of the other support. Even if it's somebody who can counter her, if she can play confidently and get the other laner's scared of her? Oh my goodness. Once Kai'Sa is allowed to snowball, she dominates games. I think her best pairs would be Braum, Thresh, Leona and maybe Lulu.
